decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: The wording of Condition 2 attached to planning permission P2020/1079/S73 dated 16/08/2021 should now read as:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:
A207-A-(00)P001; A207-A-(00)P002; A207-A-(00)P020; A207-A-(00)P031; A207-A-(00)P032; A207-A-(00)P033; A207-A-(00)P101; A207-A-(00)P102; A207-A-(00)P103; A207-A-(00)P106; A207-A-(00)P120; A207-A-(00)P130; A207-A-(00)P201; A207-A-(00)P202; A207-A-(00)P203; A207-A-(00)P301; A207-A-(00)P302; A207-A-(00)P303; A207-A-(01)P002; A207-A-(01)P020 P01; A207-A-(01)P031; A207-A-(01)P032;  A207-A-(01)P033; A207-A-(01)P101 rev 04; A207-A-(01)P102 rev 05; A207-A-(01)P103 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P104 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P105 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P106 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P107 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P108 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P109 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P110 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P111 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P112 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P113 rev 02; A207-A-(01)P201 P01; A207-A-(01)P202 P01; A207-A-(01)P203 P01; A207-A-(01)P301; A207-A-(01)P302; A207-A-(01)P303; FSB-VER-ZZZZ-DR-A-07100 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07101 S3 Rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07102 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07103 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07104 S3 rev 2; FSB-VER-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-07105 S3 rev 2; 2015-2389-AT-112; 
2015-2389-DWG-113; 2015-2389-AT-109 Rev A; 2015-2389-AT-110 Rev A; 2015-2389-AT- 111; 2015-2389A-AT-106 Rev A; 2015-2389A-AT-109 Rev A; 2015-2389A-AT-111 Rev A; 
Ventilation/extraction statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Statement of Community Involvement, prepared by Hardhat dated June 2015; Health impact Screening Assessment prepared by DP9, dated July 2015; Construction Noise and Vibration Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015, Transport Assessment and Travel Plan, prepared by TTP Consulting, dated July 2015; Geotechnical investigation and land contamination report, prepared by Soiltechnics, dated July 2015; Air Quality Management Plan, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff dated 09/07/2015; Arboricultural
Impact Assessment and Tree Protection Plan, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 24/06/2015; Planning Statement prepared by DP9, dated July 2015; Extended phase 1 Habitat Survey, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 26/06/2015; Utilities Statement, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated July 2015; Flood Risk Assessment rev B, prepared by Heyne Tillet Steel, dated 14/07/2015; Townscape, Heritage and visual impact assessment, prepared by Tavernor Consultancy, dated July 2015, Proposed Construction Management Plan for Monmouth House Redevelopment, prepared by Brookfield Multiplex, updated but sent 30/09/2015; Energy Statement prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 18/09/2015; Response to Comments from Statutory Consultees and local residents, prepared by DP9 dated September 2015; Monmouth House Potential Wind Effects letter from WSP, dated 12 October 2015; Design Note DN01: Monmouth House: Response to comments from London Borough of Islington, prepared by WSP Parsons Brinckerhoff, dated 18 September 2015; Daylight and sunlight report, prepared by GIA, dated 25 August 2015 (sent 12 October 2015). Topographical Survey (2014) 

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description:
Application for Non-Material Amendmen to planning permission ref:P2020/1079/S73 dated 16/08/2021. The proposed amendments seek to: 
- Improve the visual connection between lift lobbies and staircases, thereby increasing the use of staircases and improve tenant wellbeing;
- Provide an improvement in travel distances on the office floorplates; and
- Align with Facade Layout previously consented.
